text:
Whether you treat them to a home-cooked meal with one of the best recipe boxes, an experience on their bucket list or a luxury gift they'll treasure for years to come - Father's Day is a great time to show the father figure in your life how much you appreciate them.

Father's Day lands on Sunday 19 June in the UK this year, and if you're still struggling for gift ideas look no further. Our edit of the best Father's Day gifts includes tokens of appreciation for fitness loving dads, foodie dads and dads who value their self-care time.

We've also got wellness experiences, must-have fashion for the summer season and investment watches and sunglasses for an extra-special gift. And, if you can't see your dad this year, we've included luxury hampers and letterbox gift ideas so you can still treat them from afar.

See Red's edit of the best Father's Day gifts for 2022 below...
